Description: Five beads made in different shapes and materials. A: One spherical bead in slightly irregular shape, made of beige glass, well preserved. B: Two disc-shaped beads, one made of ostrich eggshell, one of green faience. C: One flattened spherical bead made of white faience. D: One segmented cylindrical bead, three segments preserved, made of white faience.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
